roleset.name: move on, or as if on, skates
roleset.note: SKATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'skate' based on sentences in ULA Spoken. Frame By Claire. Member of VNcls vehicle-51.4.1-1. (from skate.01-v)

example.name: usually intransitive
example.text: And we could skate to the movie or ride a bicycle to the movie.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: I swear , some groups of young people set up teams to skate on the sidewalk and street and go between cars on what they call skateboards .
